faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about creating SPA websites with AI and setting up Google tools.
faq.question1: How long does it take to create a SPA website?
faq.answer1: Usually 3-5 business days. AI significantly speeds up development, but I always check quality and manually configure all Google tools for the best results.
faq.question2: What exactly is included in the $300 price?
faq.answer2: Complete package: AI SPA development, responsive design, SEO optimization, Google Ads setup, Analytics, Tag Manager, hosting for a year, and basic tech support for a month.
faq.question3: Do I need to do anything during development?
faq.answer3: Minimum! You provide content (texts, photos) and branding, and I do everything else. I periodically show intermediate results for approval.
faq.answer4: 100% guarantee of functionality, loading speed under 3 seconds, responsiveness on all devices. If something doesn't work - I fix it for free.
faq.question5: Why is SPA better than a regular website?
faq.answer5: SPA loads instantly after the first visit, converts visitors to customers better, is easier to maintain and optimize for search engines.
faq.question6: Will I be able to edit content myself?
faq.answer6: Yes! I'll set up a simple content management system or teach you to work with files. You can also ask for help - first edits are free.
faq.question7: What to do after the website launch?
faq.answer7: I'll set up automatic analytics and advertising. You'll receive instructions on working with Google panels and promotion recommendations.
faq.question8: Do you work with all business niches?
faq.answer8: Yes! E-commerce, services, B2B, restaurants, clinics - AI allows quick adaptation to any field. I have experience in various industries.
